attributes.action: Consider plans for an edinburgh underground metro system
attributes.background: An underground system in edinburgh would benefit the area dramatically by increasing tourism to other areas in the city. It would also reduce the amount of busses around the city and there for reduce pollution. Not sure if this is a bit far fetched but it’s worth a try.

rejection.details:
The City of Edinburgh Council has it's own petitions system, you may like to start a petition here: 

http://www.edinburgh.gov.uk/info/20029/consultations_and_participation/260/petitions

You could also raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
